Home > 13 Jan 2011

What are you up to on Thursday, 10th of February?

Why, attending the next Geomob of course!

Although we kept it quiet Geomob team has been working hard on putting the next event together. So, here are the details, with more to follow soon.

DATE

February 10th (Thursday),  18:30h

LOCATION

BCS London

The Davidson Building 

5 Southampton Street

London, WC2E 7HA (map)

SPEAKERS

  • Dan Pett, from The British Museum
  • Simon Cross, from Facebook
  • Pardeep Kullar, from Likeourselves
  • Ben Dowling, from Geomium
  • VouChaCha (tbc)

AGENDA

Coming up soon!

PLEASE SIGN UP AS “ATTENDING” for this event on lanyrd
